item.title: Ashanti - Happy

작사: A. Douglas, A. Parker, R. Calhoun, I. Lorenzo

Right back
at ya
It’s the world’s
most talented
Record label
Murder INC
And that angelic voice
you hear
In the background
oh that’s our princess
Hip hop in R & B
Miss Ashanti

with so much joy
You give whatever

baby

without you

can’t take no more

running back to you

never gonna change

never gonna change

leave me
